Starships in hexes adjacent to a starship as it autodestructs take damage to the appropriate quadrants equal to half the destroyed starshipâ€™s maximum Hull Points, mitigated by shields as normal.

An autodestruct system is hardwired into the ship and has no interface that can be hacked or disabled. Once installed, it can be removed only with 1 day of work and a successful Engineering check (DC = 15 + 1-1/2 Ã— the starshipâ€™s tier). Failing this check means the autodestruct system remains active, and the engineer is aware of that fact.
